result.title: Math Fever !
result.content:
Hi everyone,

For the beginning of this summer I present to you, ladies and gentleman, a new MONTHLY CONTEST !

This time problems will have a vanilla flavor. No sorry, the contest will focus mainly on mathematics, nevertheless you will have the opportunity to demonstrate your mastery of different topics several times in order to solve the challenges. Problems will be hard enough for improving ones-self.

Contest will start on the 16th June and will last 40 days. This time the contest will be held on ACM HUST -- I wanted to try this platform as it was suggested by sgtlaugh.

As it is not easy to reach you all, I created a facebook page for this group

HF & GL !
